turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a toasted white chocolate mocha from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, what location would you like to pick it up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2113 State Hill Rd, Wyomissing, PA 19610

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great. What size are you looking for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, would you like some sugar with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please but make it 4 splenda.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds great.  Would you like any milk with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like to order nonfat milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That will be fine. Would you like any whipped cream with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The coffee does have soy in it. Do you have any allergies that we need to address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, soy is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like anything else with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. That will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, I see you have your credit card on file. Would you like it charged to that card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your drink is on order at the Wyomissing, PA location and will be ready for pickup shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you.
